meanings.definition: A young woman regarded as independent and strong-willed.
meanings.sent1: The grrrl stood up for her beliefs and never backed down.
meanings.sent2: She's a grrrl who knows what she wants and goes after it.
meanings.sent3: The grrrl decided to start her own business at just 18 years old!
meanings.sent4: Her spirit was like a fierce grrrl ready to conquer any challenge.
meanings.sent5: The image of the grrrl speaking up for equality stayed with me.

meanings.definition: A style of punk rock music associated with feminist lyrics and themes.
meanings.sent1: The band's new album is full of grrrl anthems empowering women.
meanings.sent2: Fans of grrrl music appreciate its rebellious and empowering messages.
meanings.sent3: Listening to grrrl songs always pumps me up before a workout.
meanings.sent4: The energy of the concert was like a wave of grrrl power washing over the crowd.
meanings.sent5: The grrrl music scene in the city is vibrant and inspiring.
